mapper.insert: insert into zzim(member_id, apt_id, created_at) values ( #{member_id}, #{apt_id}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE from zzim where apt_id = #{apt_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT zzim_id as zzimId, member_id as memberId, apt_id as aptId, created_at as createdAt FROM zzim WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY created_at
